entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:08 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 47 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023
